description: Upgrade your Apple with AI-powered features, from Mail to Keynote and all your other macOS applications.
title: Alter | AI for Apple power users
introduction: Alter is an AI-driven tool designed to streamline your workload by connecting with various macOS apps. It offers instant AI-driven actions to manage emails, create pitch decks, handle social media, translate documents, fix grammar, get YouTube summaries, and more.
features: About 100 GPT-4o messages or more with other providers: Groq, Claude, Together, Gemini
Act on files and folders from the Finder
Keynote AI actions to create and edit presentations
Smart views: markdown, magic diff, code
Answer Engine: search the web to answer your query and provides the links to fact-check
Image picker: generate AI images or search the web (coming soon)
Create your own context-aware AI actions
Full privacy with Ollama or LM Studio
Usage all-included, no need for your own API keys (Power User Plan)
500 credits per month to cover OpenAI, Groq, Claude, Together, Gemini and other external APIs costs (Power User Plan)
targetPeople: macOS users looking to streamline their workload with AI-driven actions
pricing: Forever Free plan with optional $240/year Power User Plan

faqs.question: What is Alter?
faqs.answer: Alter is an AI-driven tool designed to streamline your workload by connecting with various macOS apps. It offers instant AI-driven actions to manage emails, create pitch decks, handle social media, translate documents, fix grammar, get YouTube summaries, and more.

faqs.question: What are the features of the free plan?
faqs.answer: The free plan includes about 100 GPT-4o messages or more with other providers, the ability to act on text-selections, files, and folders from the Finder, Keynote AI actions, smart views, an answer engine, an image picker (coming soon), and support for OpenAI compatible endpoints.

faqs.question: What additional features are included in the Power User Plan?
faqs.answer: The Power User Plan includes everything in the free plan plus usage all-included without needing your own API keys, 500 credits per month to cover external API costs, a perpetual license, and email support.

faqs.question: How much does the Power User Plan cost?
faqs.answer: The Power User Plan costs $240 per year and includes a perpetual fallback license.

faqs.question: Does Alter support privacy?
faqs.answer: Yes, Alter offers full privacy with Ollama or LM Studio.
